summary: Through the art of stand-up comedy in four countries in the Middle East, this documentary uproots the widely held misconception that Arabs have no sense of humor.
cast: Ahmed Ahmed|Ted Alexandro|Sherif Azab|Whitney Cummings|Tommy Davidson|Omid Djalili|Erik Griffin|Maz Jobrani|Sebastian Maniscalco|Eman Morgan|Tom Papa|Maria Shehata|Angelo Tsarouchas|Noel Elgrably|Meena Dimian
title: Just Like Us
